attributes.action: Change the rules on IVF Criteria and allow every part of the country to access.
attributes.additional_details: Let’s help anyone conceive the greatest gift of life by making new parents eligible for IVF, wether they have a child from a previous relationship or not, making it accessible in every my post code.
attributes.background: IVF currently has a criteria, if your in a certain postcode they don’t allow partners that have a child in a previous relationship have IVF, if it’s available elsewhere in the same country why isn’t available everywhere.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566666
